CustomField.formula: IMAGE( CASE(RecordType.Name, 'Transit Warranty Claim', '/resource/StarTrackCaseIcons/Transit.png', 'Sales Enquiry', '/resource/StarTrackCaseIcons/Sales.png', 'Pickup Booking Enquiry', '/resource/StarTrackCaseIcons/Pickup.png', 'Credit Dispute Claim', '/resource/StarTrackCaseIcons/Credit.png', 'Delivery Enquiry', '/resource/StarTrackCaseIcons/Delivery.png', 'General Enquiry', '/resource/StarTrackCaseIcons/General.png', 'StarTrack Business Solutions Communications', '/resource/StarTrackCaseIcons/BSCEmail.png', '/resource/StarTrackCaseIcons/Other.png'),'No Image' )
CustomField.label: Record Type
